attributes.action: prevent holiday companies charging more for holidays in school holiday time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Holiday companies charge ridiculous amounts for holidays outside term time. 

This is unethical. 

It actively encourages parents to take children out of school during term time and impedes on their education.

In addition, on a less significant note: teachers, teaching assistants and other education workers find it difficult to afford holidays in school holiday time.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent holiday companies charging more for holidays in school holiday time."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
